choices.text:
Write an email to my boss letting them know I am leaving the company
Subject: [Assistant Name] Leaving Company

Dear [Boss Name],

I am writing to inform you that I will be leaving the company on [Date of Departure]. As you may know, I have been with the company for [Number of Years] years and have enjoyed working with you and the rest of the team.

I want to thank you for the opportunities you have given me and the support you have provided me during my time with the company. It has been a pleasure working with you and I will miss our interactions.

I am also grateful for the learning opportunities you have provided me and the knowledge I have gained while working with you.

I will be available to assist with any transition needs you may have until my last day on [Date of Departure].

Thank you again for everything.

Sincerely,

[Assistant Name]
